message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Its value speaks for itself, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm proposing a starting price of $1,800,000.  What are your thoughts?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,500,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I recognize your budget constraints, the value of this product is truly exceptional. Let's meet halfway - I'm willing to part with it for $1,650,000.
I'm glad we're making progress, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. My latest counteroffer is $1,600,000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
Bob, you clearly recognize the inherent value in this product.  Let's seal the deal - I'm prepared to come down slightly to $1,625,000.  This is my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice. My counteroffer is now $1,600,000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.
